summary:
I proudly present the Songblades of Hatsune! 
This project is a Tribute to Hatsune Miku, for nurturing and inspiring the music community. A community which reminds me of the Skyrim modding community. This blade is a celebration thereof. 
This custom-made blade features handcrafted (no modifiers) and optimized geometry, with custom textures.
descriptionHtml:
Stats: 
- 1HS
- Base DPS: 18
- Base DMG: 18 
- Attack Speed: 1.0  
- Delay between swings: 0.75 (Longsword standard)
- Weight: 3.00
Note: This weapon is more powerful then the Daedric counterpart, but is not meant to be a cheat object. It\'s crit rating is higher then common longswords so you should start seeing things radically retiring to the floor after you\'ve poked it from behind) 

Features: 
- Craftable under \"Elven\" Category (1 x Leek, 1 x QuickSilver Ingot, 1 x Refined Moonstone) 
- Improvable (1 x Leek) 
- Enchanteable
- Dual Wieldable
- Specular map imbedded within the normal map (Laymen\'s terms: Very sparkly in sunlight. Not like Mr. Cullen, but close.)
- Built-in parry blade
- Gives \"pommel strike\" a new meaning
- Lightweight

Q&A
Q: WTF does the blade have to do with Miku? 
A: Color convention, beauty of \"form in function\", compact, unique, inspired, by the community for the community.

Q: What\'s with the leek?
A: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kbbA9BhCTko  &   
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_mdMb6bRXt4 

Q: Who is Hatsune Miku!?
A: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DTXO7KGHtjI

Q: Are you serious?!
A: Asks the Dovahkiin! 

Q: Are you in-love!?1?! 
A: Halcyon <--- Fledgeling Otaku  :D 

Closing notes
I hope you enjoy this mod and make the sword your own :] 
Let me know what you think! (Trolls: Feel free to perform the seppuku ritual with the sword <3 )
author: Halcyon-d4079925
